message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit too high for my budget.  Would you be willing to come down to $100?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $155.
Thanks for countering Alice. I can go a little higher, but $155 is still a bit too steep for me. How about $110?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, so I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $142.50.
